you-can-use-the-address-book-to-store.1: You can use the address book to store a label for your own accounts or for easy access to other addresses throughout the application.
you-can-use-the-address-book-to-store.2: It's also possible to track the balance and/or transactions of any address, known as "watch-only".

change-rep-widget.it-is-highly-advised-to-switch-to-a-diff: It is highly advised to switch to a different representative, in order to improve security and decentralization of the nano network.
change-rep-widget.rep-represents-you: {{ name }} represents you in the nano consensus protocol by voting on your behalf.
change-rep-widget.switching-to-a-different-representative-: Switching to a different representative could improve security and decentralization of the nano network.
change-rep-widget.this-representative-has-a-high-voting-we: This representative has a high voting weight (over {{ percent }}%).
change-rep-widget.this-representative-has-a-very-high-voti: This representative has a very high voting weight (over {{ percent }}%).
change-rep-widget.this-representative-has-announced-plans-: This representative has announced plans to permanently shutdown.
change-rep-widget.this-representative-has-been-offline-for: This representative has been offline for the past {{ days }} days.
change-rep-widget.this-representative-is-marked-as-avoid: This representative is marked as "avoid" in the representatives book.
change-rep-widget.this-representative-is-marked-as-nf: This representative was created by the Nano Foundation and should be avoided to increase decentralization.
change-rep-widget.this-representative-is-often-offline: This representative is often offline ({{ percent }}% uptime)
change-rep-widget.this-representative-is-sometimes-offline: This representative is sometimes offline ({{ percent }}% uptime).
change-rep-widget.we-could-not-determine-status-of-this-re: We could not determine status of this representative.
change-rep-widget.we-found-no-issues-with-uptime-or-weight: We found no issues with uptime or weight distribution of your current representative.
change-rep-widget.you-can-change-representative-at-any-tim: You can change representative at any time by clicking on its name above.
change-rep-widget.you-have-marked-this-representative-as-t: You have marked this representative as trusted, meaning its status will remain "Good" even in case of severe issues with uptime or weight distribution.

configure-app.change-if-your-wallet-should-be-locked-a: Change if your wallet should be locked automatically after you have not interacted with it for a certain period of time
configure-app.change-the-currency-pair-used-when-showi: Change the currency pair used when showing fiat values in the application. Select None to hide fiat pairs.
configure-app.change-where-your-wallet-is-stored-if-yo: Change where your wallet is stored. If you select none, your wallet is reset every time you reload.
configure-app.change-which-server-is-used-to-communica: Change which server is used to communicate with the nano network

clear-all-data.1: You are about to delete all data stored in Nault, which includes all locally stored data about your currently configured wallet, all entries from your address and representative books, and any other cached data. All settings will be reset to default.
clear-all-data.successfully-deleted-locally-stored-data: Successfully deleted locally stored data and reset the settings!

configure-app.cpu-worker-support-not-available-set-pow: CPU Worker support not available, set PoW to Best

configure-app.custom-update-server-has-an-invalid-addr: Custom Update Server has an invalid address.

decentralized-aliases-options.enabled: Enabled - Allow External Requests to Alias Domains

configure-app.decentralized-aliases-require-external-r: Decentralized aliases require external requests to alias domains. When you try to lookup the address of @madeline@example.com, the domain example.com may record your IP address.
configure-app.default-representative-is-not-a-valid-ac: Default representative is not a valid account
configure-app.for-example-using-basic-auth: For example using basic auth: Basic xyz
configure-app.if-automatically-receiving-incoming-tran: If automatically receiving incoming transactions with the largest amount first or chronological from recorded time. Manual will allow you to pick your own transactions from the receive screen.
configure-app.leave-blank-to-accept-transactions-of-an: Leave blank to accept transactions of any amount
configure-app.leave-blank-to-use-a-recommended-one: Leave blank to use a recommended one
configure-app.minimum-nano-amount-to-receive-transacti: Minimum XNO amount to receive. Transactions below this amount will be ignored by the wallet both for receiving and in the transactions list.  Set to blank or 0 to accept all transactions.
configure-app.note-since-this-server-only-notifies-abo: Note: Since this server only notifies about new transactions, most of the wallet functions fine without it.
configure-app.optional-increased-work-for-transaction-: Optional increased work for transaction priority during network saturation. Overrides both default SEND 1x and RECEIVE 1/64x difficulties.
configure-app.switched-back-to-browser-local-storage-f: Switched back to "Browser Local Storage" for the wallet data. Use the button again if you want to save other settings.
configure-app.this-has-to-be-a-valid-authorization-hea: This has to be a valid Authorization header.

configure-app.this-server-is-used-for-rpc-communicatio: This server is used for RPC communication with the nano node
configure-app.this-server-is-used-to-notify-the-wallet: This server is used to notify the wallet in real time when new transactions arrive

configure-app.you-are-about-to-disable-storage-of-all-: You are about to disable storage of all wallet data, which means there will be no wallet configured next time you use Nault.

new-wallet.i-have-securely-stored-recovery-phrases: I have securely stored the secret recovery seed and/or mnemonic

1.1: Make sure to write down your seed and/or mnemonic or save it somewhere safe, and

recovery-phrases-alert.2: It is the master key to all of your accounts, and the only way to recover your funds in an emergency.

set-wallet-password.for-the-safety-of-your-funds-use-a-secur: For the safety of your funds, use a secure password.
set-wallet-password.while-the-application-is-locked-the-secr: While the application is locked, the secret recovery phrase will be encrypted, which prevents sending/receiving funds and managing accounts.

reset-wallet.before-continuing-make-sure-you-have-sav: Before continuing, make sure you have saved the secret recovery seed and/or mnemonic of your current wallet.
reset-wallet.you-will-not-be-able-to-recover-the-fund: YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO RECOVER THE FUNDS without a backup of your currently configured wallet.

welcome.a-secure-open-source-wallet-for-nano: A secure open source wallet for nano

advanced-security-features.1: Support for Ledger Nano S / Nano X hardware wallets
advanced-security-features.2: Ability to create multi-signature addresses where multiple private keys are required to access and transfer the funds
advanced-security-features.3: Ability to sign transactions remotely, allowing you to conduct transactions securely without ever allowing your secret keys to leave your offline device
advanced-security-features.nault-includes: Nault includes several options for enhanced security:
advanced-security-features.title: Advanced Security Features

welcome.welcome-back-it-looks-like-your-wallet-i: Welcome back! It looks like your wallet is already configured.

your-keys-your-coins.1: You are solely responsible for the security of your funds.
your-keys-your-coins.2: Secret keys that you use in Nault are temporarily stored on your device, encrypted by the password that you choose.
your-keys-your-coins.3: No sensitive data is ever sent across the internet.
